name: neo-n3-nft-platform
description: Neo NFT会员卡平台: 批量创建会员卡、权益卡、签到卡并支持懒铸造领取

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace @platform/neo-sdk && npm run build --workspace @platform/api && npm run build --workspace @platform/web
scripts.build:contract:csharp: rm -f contracts/multi-tenant-nft-platform/build/*.nef contracts/multi-tenant-nft-platform/build/*.manifest.json && rm -rf contracts/multi-tenant-nft-platform/build/.template-tmp && ./tools/nccs contracts/nft-platform-factory/MultiTenantNftPlatform.csproj -o contracts/multi-tenant-nft-platform/build --base-name MultiTenantNftPlatform --optimize=All --debug=None && mkdir -p contracts/multi-tenant-nft-platform/build/.template-tmp && ./tools/nccs contracts/multi-tenant-nft-platform/MultiTenantNftTemplate.csproj -o contracts/multi-tenant-nft-platform/build/.template-tmp --base-name MultiTenantNftTemplate --optimize=All --debug=None && cp contracts/multi-tenant-nft-platform/build/.template-tmp/MultiTenantNftTemplate.nef contracts/multi-tenant-nft-platform/build/MultiTenantNftTemplate.nef && cp contracts/multi-tenant-nft-platform/build/.template-tmp/MultiTenantNftTemplate.manifest.json contracts/multi-tenant-nft-platform/build/MultiTenantNftTemplate.manifest.json && rm -rf contracts/multi-tenant-nft-platform/build/.template-tmp && node tools/build-template-deploy-manifest.js
scripts.build:contract:solidity: rm -f contracts/solidity/build/*.nef contracts/solidity/build/*.manifest.json && cargo run --manifest-path ~/git/neo-solidity/Cargo.toml --bin neo-solc -- contracts/solidity/MultiTenantNftPlatform.sol -I ~/git/neo-solidity/devpack -O2 --contract MultiTenantNftPlatform -o contracts/solidity/build/MultiTenantNftPlatform
scripts.verify:contracts: npm run build:contract:csharp && npm run build:contract:solidity && npm run build:contract:rust && npm run check:contract:nep && npm run check:contract:consistency
